page.title: 01CHEW VALLEY AREA
page.content: The area is mainly{fields}and {farming.}It is quite hilly. There are three main villages{Felton,Winford}and {Dundry.}We are in Winford.There are schools and Churches in all three villages ,and Shops and Post Offices in Winford and Felton.Near Winford there's Winford Hospital,and in all three villages there are Pubs.There are also three quite small reservoirs with water works beside them.There are quite a few springs in the area.There are{three disused quarries}in the area but there is another one which is working,and also{two disused pits,}and so there are quite a lot of old {disused mine shafts.
